content: शुभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शुभ्-क] {@--1@} Shining, bright. {@--2@} Beautiful, handsome; जंघे शुभे सृष्ट्रवतस्तदीये <ls>Ku. 1. 35.</ls> {@--3@} Auspicious, lucky, happy, fortunate. {@--4@} Eminent, good, virtuous, <ls>Pt. 1. 358.</ls> {@--5@} Learned, versed in the Vedas. --भं {@--1@} Auspiciousness, welfare, good fortune, happiness, good, prosperity. प्रायः शुभं च विदधात्यशुभं च जंतोः सर्वंकषा भगवती भवितव्यतैव <ls>Māl. 1. 23.</ls> {@--2@} An ornament. {@--3@} Water. {@--4@} A kind of fragrant wood.
